# App Store Connect API 2.2 release notes

**Article**

Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

## Overview

App Store Connect API version 2.2 provides resources that enable you to automate actions you take in App Store Connect.

### New features

- Added support for getting information about and editing [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/sandbox-testers] and clearing [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/sandbox-testers] purchase history.
- Expanded support around [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-encryption-declarations], state and documents.
- [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/billing-grace-periods] now has additional parameters including 3 distinct durations.

### Deprecations

- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-inAppPurchases] endpoint is now deprecated and replaced with the [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-inAppPurchasesV2] endpoint.

## Versions

- **App Store Connect API 4.1 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 4.0 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 3.8 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

- **App Store Connect API 3.3 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 3.2 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

- **App Store Connect API 2.4 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
